titleStmt.title: An excellent new song call'd, The female duel; or, The victorious Williamite lady, who was challeng'd to fight a duel by a Jacobite lady. Tune of, If love's a sweet passion.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by P. Pelcomb,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.
Verse: "In Yokshire [sic] late happen'd a desperate fight ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
